author: jefft
msg: Redefine components in subsitemaps, where they are used.  Putting them in the
main sitemap makes upgrading almost impossible, as sitemap.xmap is frequently
overridden, which locks in place an old set of components.

author: cheche
msg: Added version 1.23 from upstream using same commented excludes except block stx

author: jefft
msg: Be explicit about where to put the dtd
